DOC.brief_summary: To assess efficacy MK0524 seasonal allergy .
DOC.brief_title: MK0524 Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis Study ( 0524-005 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Person least 2 year seasonal allergy Person positive skin test least 1 allergen season Person nonsmoker Person hospitalize within last 4 week Person female baby within last 8 week still breastfeed
